item.title: Veterans Coming Home Center
item.description: The only day shelter in Springfield, MO working to be there when people are hurting by providing Christian hospitality and respect for life through the services of food, clothing, shelter, education and job training programs.

item.title: VCHCenter - Living Life with Love
item.description: A podcast about becoming a new creation in Christ through service and ministry to the poor. Pastor Chris Aaron Rice shares his experience of service to those in need.
